verses.text: \w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Babylon \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thought|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8432"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poplars|strong="H6155"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w hung|strong="H8518"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w captors|strong="H7617"\w* \w called|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*: \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w tormentors|strong="H8437"\w*, \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*: ‘\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.’

How can \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5236"\w*’s land?
If I \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* you, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, may \w my|strong="H7911"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* wither.

\w May|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w stick|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w roof|strong="H2441"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*, if \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am unmindful \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* don’t \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Edomites, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*’s fall, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* said, ‘\w Lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H6168"\w* \w bare|strong="H6168"\w*, \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H6168"\w* \w bare|strong="H6168"\w*, \w right|strong="H3068"\w* down \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H6168"\w* \w very|strong="H5704"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w*.’

Babylon, despoiler, happy \w are|strong="H1323"\w* those \w who|strong="H1323"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w you|strong="H1580"\w* \w back|strong="H7999"\w* \w for|strong="H7999"\w* all \w you|strong="H1580"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* \w done|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H1323"\w* us.

Happy \w are|strong="H5768"\w* they who seize \w and|strong="H5768"\w* \w dash|strong="H5310"\w* \w your|strong="H5310"\w* \w children|strong="H5768"\w* against \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*.
